data.message: Session: Fix Duro embedding queue processing: Diagnosed embedding queue not processing (MCP has no background worker). Implemented synchronous embedding: added _embed_artifact_sync() helper, modified 5 artifact store handlers (fact, decision, episode create/close, evaluation), changed duro_reembed to process sync. Result: 100% embedding coverage, immediate vector search. Committed and pushed to duro-mcp.
data.task: Session: Fix Duro embedding queue processing
